title: JackieKing
author: JackieKing
content: I am Jackieking. Can anyone tell me the name of some best sites from where I can earn.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: JackieKing on July 22, 2023, 12:38:12 PMI am Jackieking. Can anyone tell me the name of some best sites from where I can earn.Based on your post I can only provide you with faucets and PTC you can check the Micro Earnings.But if you add in your post that you are good at writing or had good communication skills, or had a lot of social media followers then I can recommend bounty projects, you have to provide what you are good at like if you have a coding skill you are a designer then Fiverr and the service section is best suited to you.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: It's good to see some forum members has already giving you some very helpful links that can aid you but I don't know about you the list looks too long and can discourage anyone, well you can make it easier for people to help you by firstly telling us what you are really interested in, there are many opportunities to earn on line but one person can be able to do all of it. So you point of interests and experience can help narrow the list down for your own better understanding.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: Here are ways to make money on this forum which may or may not work for you.1. Go to Services Board (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0)2. Create a thread offering any of your service3. If your work is good, you will get clients. Else, you won't.4. If you get client, you earn money.That's it, good luck.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Write short stories and be paid[/b]If you can write short stories to get paid then this is a site for you. I was also there, I had written some stories and also partook on the weekly writing competition to earn £20. So if you can write and interested to join then you can register with them and start writing short stories and publish. There is free membership and premier members. You can use the free membership to practice the site and when you have master the writing and the site then you can become a full premier member to earn well. I was there before I met Bitcointalk. I wish you good luck.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: Quote from: JackieKing on July 22, 2023, 12:38:12 PMCan anyone tell me the name of some best sites from where I can earn.What about your interests? Do you know how you can earn cryptocurrencies from this forum or outside it ? There are many ways to try for a passive earning but all aren't much worthy. I can advise you to join Bounty Campaigns in this forum which is a very popular way to make passive income. You just go to this Bounties (Altcoins) board and you will get the list of every running campaigns. Just follow the rules and instructions for every bounty. Just remember that every project will not pay you so you have to find out potential projects or you can join escrowed projects. There is a another popular way to make passive income is to join Airdrops. It's very hard to find out legit airdrops because most of them are scam and not worthy. If you follow some reputated YouTubers then you may grab a good amount of passive earning by completing airdrop tasks. There are many ways but I think you should start with them and be experienced. Later you will have knowledge about others worthy opportunities of earning.
